official_title: A bill to amend section 355 of the Revised Statutes of the United States to authorize the head of any agency of the United States to retrocede to a State concurrent jurisdiction over any lands or interests therein over which the United States has previously acquired exclusive jurisdiction.

summary.text: Authorizes the head of any Federal agency to retrocede to a State concurrent jurisdiction over any lands or interests in lands over which the United States has previously acquired exclusive jurisdiction, after agreement with the State in which such lands or interests are located.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 355 of the Revised Statutes of the United States to authorize the head of any agency of the United States to retrocede to a State concurrent jurisdiction over any lands or interests therein over which the United States has previously acquired exclusive jurisdiction.
